name: Paramount Communication Group
tag_list: email-marketing, email, social-media, social-networking, email-provider, emarketing
overview:
Paramount Communication Group is an Email Marketing Provider and Social Media Marketing Company.

EMAIL SERVICE PROVIDER: Paramount specializes in helping online retailers create highly targeted email programs that engage customers as their wants, needs, and motivations develop over time. Paramount has a sterling reputation with ISPs and SPAM-fighting organizations which translates into unparalleled email deliverability for clients.

SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGEMENT: Paramount’s partnership with Shoutlet gives clients a platform to develop their social media presence with Facebook, Twitter, widgets, video, RSS, and emailâ€”all in one place.

CUSTOM DESIGN PROJECTS: Paramount offers custom design services in HTML Email Messaging, Landing Page Construction, Banner Ads & Graphic Design, Social Media Management, Email List Building & more.
